option: Defines (the name of) an additional directory of "help" files for use by the the option. The option can be used multiple times to specify multiple help directories. Each use of adds one directory to the list. The search for a help file uses these directories in the reverse order, looking first in the directory specified in the last, right-most option. If the help file is not found in any of these directores, the search looks (as usual) in the directory tree defined by the environment variable BOUNDT_HELP.
